item.title: OpenSource federated alternative to Strava
item.description: Long time no see. I’m planning to rebuild a new server, it’s gonna be really nice I’m excited about it. Meanwhile, another project that would be interesting to do, in the long-term since I don’t have the skillz now: a federated open-source alternative to Strava. I like running and like to have stats about myself, and the social part of Strava is nice too. I’ve ran into this project: PikaTrack which seems already pretty nice.

item.title: In love with the Fediverse
item.description: I’ve been aware of the Fediverse for some time already. Basically this is a “Federated Universe” of different social networks, based on open protocols. You might have heard of Mastodon for example. Well, after reading an article about it (French version - Italian original version), I want to get involved in it. This summer I’m planning on building a new hardware server, and I’ll try to set up instances of Mastodon, PeerTube and FunkWhale.
